=========================

ID: CF4VALZ_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-12 14:12
Subject: Group's Branding, Are you ready to OMNISTART, Chanel First Boutique Opens in Kuwait, Yas Island Summer Offer, Faces Skincare Offer, Instant meeting room support, Weekly internal opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1229&user=10620> 	

As we celebrate 70 years of Chalhoub Group, we honour a legacy and a corporate brand built through decades of excellence, earning a respected image and a strong reputation. 
Discover the tools that help us express and protect this legacy — from brand guidelines and tone of voice to visual and sonic identity. Explore the full brand system and access key resources to align your work with our master brand.

Click here to learn more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1229&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Are you ready to OMNISTART?

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1230&user=10620>

chunks.text:
Click here to learn more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1229&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Are you ready to OMNISTART?

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1230&user=10620> 	

We have just launched OMNISTART, our new e-learning course designed to embark on our journey toward a truly Omnichannel mindset.
Aligned with our Vision 2033, OMNISTART helps us all speak the same Omni language; whether in-store, online, or behind the scenes. This beginner-level course will build a common understanding of how we can connect experiences across every touchpoint to delight our customers and drive sustainable growth.
Upon successful completion, you’ll receive a certificate that you can proudly share on OneChalhoub to inspire others to join the movement!
Start your OMNISTART journey on Chalhoub University! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1230&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

The first CHANEL beauty Boutique Opens in Kuwait

We are delighted to announce the grand opening of our very first CHANEL Fragrance & Beauty boutique in Kuwait, located in the prestigious 360 Mall.

This marks a significant milestone as we bring the timeless elegance and innovation of CHANEL targeting new audience in the region.

chunks.text:
We are delighted to announce the grand opening of our very first CHANEL Fragrance & Beauty boutique in Kuwait, located in the prestigious 360 Mall.

This marks a significant milestone as we bring the timeless elegance and innovation of CHANEL targeting new audience in the region. 

We look forward to welcoming you to discover the world of CHANEL and share in this exciting new chapter. 
Here’s to a beautiful beginning — and many more to come!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/e9e0fefadd70356143b5ee709f9f79bb39362622.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Yas Island Summer Offer Update

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/56667e7344de2c6d0add3150acf991bc2054268116.gif> 	

Enjoy limited time discount across Yas Island award winning theme parks, valid from 16 June - 31 July:
- Ferrari World Abu Dhabi
- Warner Bros. World™
- Yas Waterworld Abu Dhabi
- SeaWorld® Yas Island, Abu Dhabi

Exclusive for our Chalhoub Group team members, enjoy AED 145 per ticket for up to 5 tickets by presenting your Chalhoub Group ID card or One Chalhoub profile directly at the ticketing counter.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Faces Skincare Offer

Reset your self-care routine for the summer days ahead! Treat yourself to 100 AED / SAR off your favourite skincare and haircare picks when you spend 899 AED / SAR at Faces stores or Faces.com. Your glowing skin and healthy hair deserve a seasonal upgrade!

Valid from 10th June - 5th July 2025.

Valid from 10th June - 5th July 2025.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/389e4009910f7b5e0599115d611afcdf279796828.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

Instant Meeting Room Support

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1231&user=10620> 	

You asked, We listened!
If something’s not quite right in a meeting room, help is always close by.
Just scan the QR code in the room, and IT support will be notified immediately via Teams and WhatsApp to come and assist. No delays, no ticket forms - just quick, on-the-spot support to keep your meetings on track. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1231&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-2-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1232&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!  

You can also refer your network directly through our Internal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1233&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
